article:
The '5-HT 1A receptor' is a subtype of 5-HT receptor that binds the
endogenous neurotransmitter serotonin (5-hydroxytryptamine, 5-HT). It is a G protein-
coupled receptor (GPCR) that is coupled to G i/G o and
mediates inhibitory neurotransmission. HTR1A denotes the human gene encoding for
the receptor.
